bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Design and Construction of Non-Load Break Disconnect Switches for Direct Current Applications on Transit Systems
IEEE Draft Standard for Design and Construction of Non-Load Break Disconnect Switches for Direct Current Applications on Transit Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This Standard is a basis for the design, application, and usage of direct current non load (no-load) break disconnect switches for the purpose of isolating direct current power distribution circuits for transit applications.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: high voltage direct current disconnect switches
